author: danielf
msg: Update the core pom to include the servlet-service modules and not include the blocks-fw demo and samples. Use the servlet-service samples in the cocoon-webapp. The samples seem to work.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 40524. request.getAuthType() now returns CLIENT_CERT rather than CLIENT-CERT as per the spec. Now only web.xml, o.a.c.deploy.LoginConfig and Authenticators.properties use CLIENT-CERT.

author: szoerner
msg: Simplify default server.xml by using another property setting style for simple values and references according to DIRSERVER-825.

author: jm
msg: bug 4999: ensure spamd --auth-ident requires ident match User header in all situations
